statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ -4 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -12 \\ 11 \\ -8 \\ -4 \\ -6 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -16 \\ 16 \\ -12 \\ 2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 4 \\ -9 \\ -1 \\ -1 \\ 4 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
